---
title: Creating Custom Themes
description: Detailed guide for creating custom Ulauncher themes
---

# Creating Custom Themes

:::note
Theme support has not been tested and probably is broken in Ulauncher v6 (next version).
:::

This page provides additional details on creating custom color themes for Ulauncher.

## Theme Structure

As of Ulauncher 6.0.0, themes can be simple CSS files placed in the user theme directory (`~/.config/ulauncher/user-themes`).

### Basic Theme File

A basic theme is a CSS file that defines the colors and styles for Ulauncher's interface. Here's a minimal example:

```css
.input {
  background-color: #2d2d2d;
  color: #ffffff;
}

.result-box {
  background-color: #1a1a1a;
}

.selected.item-box {
  background-color: #404040;
}

.item-name {
  color: #ffffff;
}

.item-text {
  color: #cccccc;
}

.item-highlight {
  color: #ff7b57;
}
```

## Theme Development Workflow

1. Create a new CSS file in `~/.config/ulauncher/user-themes/`
2. Open Ulauncher Preferences and select your theme
3. Edit the CSS file with your preferred colors
4. Press `Ctrl+Space` (or your hotkey) to see the changes
5. Iterate until you're satisfied with the result

## Key CSS Classes

- `.input` - The search input field
- `.result-box` - Container for all results
- `.item-box` - Individual result item
- `.selected.item-box` - Selected result item
- `.item-name` - Result title text
- `.item-text` - Result description text
- `.item-highlight` - Highlighted/matched text

## Resources

- [Built-in themes](https://github.com/Ulauncher/Ulauncher/tree/HEAD/data/themes) - Reference implementations
- [Community themes](https://gist.github.com/gornostal/02a232e6e560da7946c053555ced6cce) - Themes created by the community
- [GTK3 CSS Documentation](https://docs.gtk.org/gtk3/css-overview.html) - Complete CSS reference for GTK applications
